channel.title: How to add Custom items, npcs, ect
channel.description:
Hello, i have a tricky problem that i cant solve. When i add the ints and models into the client, compile, and re-run my server, spawn the item, it is no where near the item i was wanting, it has the name of the custom item but does not look like it.
If anyone can help, at all, that would be great.
Thanks.

item.title: How to add Custom items, npcs, ect
item.dc:creator: @lol_space1 lol space
item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

This is correct, I’m kind of confused on “I’m adding models & ints to client” but, you need to put the models in your cache, if the server has the models pre-packed, just replace them and it will replace the item you have gotten, instead of the item you want.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add Custom items, npcs, ect

item.title: How to add Custom items, npcs, ect
item.dc:creator: @ReaperXScape ReaperXScape
item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

Maybe the models you used were already packed in to the cache so it displays a different item.
try changing the model files.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add Custom items, npcs, ect
